#include <cstdio>
#define mod 1000000007
#define inverse_fact 808333339

using namespace std;

long long int ways_calc(long int rem)
{
    int i;long long int result=inverse_fact;
    for(i=1;i<=5;i++)
        {result*=rem-i;result%=mod;}
    return result;
}

int main()
{
    int t;long int n,i;
    long long int ways=0;
    scanf("%i",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        ways=0;
        for(i=12;i<n;i=i+2) ways = (ways + ways_calc(i>>1)) % mod;
        printf("%lld\n",ways);
     }
    return 0;
}
